title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, September 19, 2020
description: On this date in 1940, Polish soldier Witold Pilecki allowed himself to be captured by the Nazis so he could find out what was happening at Auschwitz.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this date in 1940, Polish soldier Witold Pilecki allowed himself to be captured by the Nazis so he could find out what was happening at Auschwitz.
